title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Bun, Deno, and modern browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama models for chat, tools, embeddings, and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama; manage models, chats, documents, and users in one place.

title: ollama4j
summary: Unofficial Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent API with reactive streams and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for Ollama: chat, generate, pull, and list models with idiomatic Ruby blocks.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with conversation history, syntax highlighting, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-style code-completion engine for VS Code and JetBrains.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration that lets you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG starter: ingest PDFs, chunk, embed, and chat with local documents using Ollama + Chroma.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that brings Ollama models into any server with slash commands and thread support.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that exposes Ollama as a conversational bot with DM and channel threading.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI/CD pipelines: spin up Ollama service, run model tests, and push embeddings to artifact stores.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Unofficial Nim client for Ollama with async/await, JSON streaming, and nimble package distribution.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly-typed bindings to Ollama’s REST API with Tokio streaming.

title: ollama-go
summary: Idiomatic Go SDK for Ollama with context cancellation, retry logic, and optional OpenAI compatibility layer.
